theme.name: Next-Generation Research Platform
theme.style_description: Modern, professional B2B SaaS platform with a focus on data visualization and research tools. Clean, sophisticated interface with scientific precision and cutting-edge innovation aesthetic. Uses deep blues and purples to convey trust, intelligence, and technology.

icon_system.usage_notes: Use icons for navigation, actions, and data representations. Maintain 24px default size for consistency. Use stroke-width of 2 for optimal clarity.

imagery.style_preferences: As a web-app focused on research and data, imagery is minimal. When needed, use abstract representations of data, networks, and research concepts. Icon-based UI is preferred. Any decorative graphics should be subtle, geometric, and data-inspired patterns.
